gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Mavericks 125, Pelicans 120
gameRecap.excerpt: The Mavericks closed the game on a 21-9 run and defeated the Pelicans, 125-120. Kyrie Irving recorded 42 points, seven rebounds, and seven assists for the Mavericks, while Tim Hardaway Jr. added a season-high 41 points (9-15 3PM) and two rebounds in the victory. Zion Williamson tallied 30 points and three assists for the Pelicans in the losing effort. The Mavericks improve to 24-17 in the regular season, while the Pelicans fall to 24-17.
